snippet: “Looking Back/The 6th White Columns Annual — Selected by Ken Okiishi and Nick Mauss” is an indispensible year-end review of alternative art.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Looking Back/The 6th White Columns Annual--Selected by Ken Okiishi and Nick Mauss at White Columns gallery.
